com.google.android.exoplayer.demo.simple

Class SimplePlayerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.google.android.exoplayer.demo.simple.SimplePlayerActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExoPlayer.Listener, MediaCodecTrackRenderer.EventListener, MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener

    public class SimplePlayerActivity
extends Activity
implements ExoPlayer.Listener, MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
    An activity that plays media using ExoPlayer.

      • onPlayerStateChanged

        public void onPlayerStateChanged(boolean playWhenReady,
                        int playbackState)
        Description copied from interface: ExoPlayer.Listener
        Invoked when the value returned from either ExoPlayer.getPlayWhenReady() or ExoPlayer.getPlaybackState() changes.
        Specified by:
        onPlayerStateChanged in interface ExoPlayer.Listener
        Parameters:
        playWhenReady - Whether playback will proceed when ready.
        playbackState - One of the STATE constants defined in this class.

      • onPlayWhenReadyCommitted

        public void onPlayWhenReadyCommitted()
        Description copied from interface: ExoPlayer.Listener
        Invoked when the current value of ExoPlayer.getPlayWhenReady() has been reflected by the internal playback thread.

        An invocation of this method will shortly follow any call to ExoPlayer.setPlayWhenReady(boolean) that changes the state. If multiple calls are made in rapid succession, then this method will be invoked only once, after the final state has been reflected.

        Specified by:
        onPlayWhenReadyCommitted in interface ExoPlayer.Listener

      • onPlayerError

        public void onPlayerError(ExoPlaybackException e)
        Description copied from interface: ExoPlayer.Listener
        Invoked when an error occurs. The playback state will transition to ExoPlayer.STATE_IDLE immediately after this method is invoked. The player instance can still be used, and ExoPlayer.release() must still be called on the player should it no longer be required.
        Specified by:
        onPlayerError in interface ExoPlayer.Listener
        Parameters:
        e - The error.

      • onVideoSizeChanged

        public void onVideoSizeChanged(int width,
                      int height)
        Description copied from interface: MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Invoked each time there's a change in the size of the video being rendered.
        Specified by:
        onVideoSizeChanged in interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Parameters:
        width - The video width in pixels.
        height - The video height in pixels.

      • onDrawnToSurface

        public void onDrawnToSurface(Surface surface)
        Description copied from interface: MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Invoked when a frame is rendered to a surface for the first time following that surface having been set as the target for the renderer.
        Specified by:
        onDrawnToSurface in interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Parameters:
        surface - The surface to which a first frame has been rendered.

      • onDroppedFrames

        public void onDroppedFrames(int count,
                   long elapsed)
        Description copied from interface: MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Invoked to report the number of frames dropped by the renderer. Dropped frames are reported whenever the renderer is stopped having dropped frames, and optionally, whenever the count reaches a specified threshold whilst the renderer is started.
        Specified by:
        onDroppedFrames in interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Parameters:
        count - The number of dropped frames.
        elapsed - The duration in milliseconds over which the frames were dropped. This duration is timed from when the renderer was started or from when dropped frames were last reported (whichever was more recent), and not from when the first of the reported drops occurred.

      • onDecoderInitializationError

        public void onDecoderInitializationError(MediaCodecTrackRenderer.DecoderInitializationException e)
        Description copied from interface: MediaCodecTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Invoked when a decoder fails to initialize.
        Specified by:
        onDecoderInitializationError in interface MediaCodecTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Parameters:
        e - The corresponding exception.
